aws::graph::propositions: # Meteorological Information and Flight Plan for Accident
The accident site had Instrument Meteorological Conditions (IMC).
The condition of light at the accident site was Day.
The observation facility was GUC at 7680 feet mean sea level.
The observation facility was 24 Nautical Miles from the accident site.
The observation time was 14:35 Local.
The observation facility was 200° direction from the accident site.
The visibility at the accident site was 10 miles.
The lowest ceiling was Broken at 4600 feet Above Ground Level (AGL).
The wind speed was 11 knots.
The wind had gusts of 14 knots.
The wind direction was 230°.
No turbulence was experienced.
The altimeter setting was 30.14 inches of mercury (Hg).
The temperature was 6°C.
The dew point was -3°C.
There was no obscuration at the accident site.
There was no precipitation at the accident site.
The departure point was Denver, Colorado (APA).
The destination was Colorado City, Arizona (AZC).
The flight plan filed was Instrument Flight Rules (IFR).
The clearance type was Instrument Flight Rules (IFR).
The departure time was 13:45 Local.
The aircraft sustained minor damage.
There was no aircraft fire.
There was no aircraft explosion.
The crew consisted of 1 person.
The crew member had no injuries.
The total injuries were 1 None.
The accident occurred at latitude 38.912498, longitude -106.766113.

text:
# Meteorological Information and Flight Plan

## Conditions at Accident Site:
| Instrument (IMC) | Condition of Light: | Day |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Observation Facility, Elevation: | GUC,7680 ft msl | Distance from Accident Site: | 24 Nautical Miles |
| Observation Time: | 14:35 Local | Direction from Accident Site: | 200° |
| Lowest Cloud Condition: | Visibility | 10 miles |
| Lowest Ceiling: | Broken / 4600 ft AGL | Visibility (RVR): |  |
| Wind Speed/Gusts: | 11 knots / 14 knots | Turbulence Type Forecast/Actual: | / None |
| Wind Direction: | 230° | Turbulence Severity Forecast/Actual: | / N/A |
| Altimeter Setting: | 30.14 inches Hg | Temperature/Dew Point: | 6°C / -3°C |
| Precipitation and Obscuration: | No Obscuration; No Precipitation |  |  |
| Departure Point: | Denver, CO (APA ) | Type of Flight Plan Filed: | IFR |
| Destination: | Colorado City, AZ (AZC ) | Type of Clearance: | IFR |
| Departure Time: | 13:45 Local | Type of Airspace: |  |

## Wreckage and Impact Information
| Crew Injuries: | 1 None | Aircraft Damage: | Minor |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Passenger Injuries: |  | Aircraft Fire: | None |
| Ground Injuries: | N/A | Aircraft Explosion: | None |
| Total Injuries: | 1 None | Latitude, Longitude: | 38.912498,-106.766113 |

---
